internacional.title: International
internacional.description: The classic game. Played to 100 or 150 points with standard rules. The player with the highest tile starts the match.

cubano.title: Cuban
cubano.description: A strategic partner game to 150 points. Popular in Cuba, it focuses on teamwork and tile counting. The highest double does not always start.

dominicano.title: Dominican
dominicano.description: A fast-paced, competitive version from the Dominican Republic, played to 200 points. The double six always starts the first round.

mexicano.title: Mexican
mexicano.description: Also known as Mexican Train. A popular social variant where players build their own 'trains' from a central hub. (This mode is not available yet).
